page.title: 17SOUTH PARK SPORTS_S.REIGATE
page.content: South Park Football Club was formed in 1897.In 1925 the South Park Sports Association comprising the Football Club,Cricket Club and a Darts team was formed.A field of 5 acres was leased in Brickyard Lane now Whitehall Lane opposite St Lukes School.The field was purchased in 1935.A Street collection of 1p a week, fund raising events and personal donations supplemented a grant from the King George V Memorial Fund. The ground was vested in the National Playing Fields Association. Four acres added in 1980 provided four football pitches,a cricket pitch and stoolball wicket.Dart and Pool teams compete in the clubhouse.Badminton is played in the Parish Hall.The wooden pavilion of 1925 is now a brick built cubhouse in 1985.The storeroom is a 1939-45 war-time blast shelter.
